register.reg_long_name: Branch Record Injection into the Branch Record Buffer

purpose_text.para: Injects the Branch Record held in BRBINFINJ_EL1, BRBSRCINJ_EL1, and BRBTGTINJ_EL1 into the Branch Record Buffer.

attributes_text.para: BRB INJ is a 64-bit System instruction.

access_permission_text.para: Rt should be encoded as 0b11111. If the Rt field is not set to 0b11111, it is CONSTRAINED UNPREDICTABLE whether:

content.para: The instruction behaves as if the Rt field is set to 0b11111.

ps.name: BRB
